item.title: LeetCode 804. Unique Morse Code Words 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 摩斯密碼對照表參照。Map char to integer then combine.

item.title: LeetCode 763. Partition Labels 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 將字串 s 分段，同一字母只能在一段中出現。Partition the string into as many parts as possible so that each letter appears in at most one part.

item.title: LeetCode 67. Add Binary 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 兩個字串進行二進位數值加法，並回傳字串。Given two binary strings a and b, return their sum as a binary string.

item.title: LeetCode 387. First Unique Character in a String 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 尋找字串中第一個出現的唯一字母。Traverse the string, get the first unique character.

item.title: LeetCode 2000. Reverse Prefix of Word 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 將從 0 到指定位置的文字片段翻轉。Reverse the segment of word that starts at index 0 and ends at the index of the ch.

item.title: LeetCode 412. Fizz Buzz 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 給定一個 array，依照指定規則代換語詞。Given an integer $n$, return a string array answer (1-indexed).

item.title: LeetCode 1790. Check if One String Swap Can Make Strings Equal 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 希望在最多做一次字元交換的情況下，使兩個 string 相同。If it is possible to make both strings equal by performing at most one string swap on exactly one of the strings.
